§ 5102. Definition of manufacturer of stills Any person who manufactures any still or condenser to be used in distilling shall be deemed a manufacturer of stills. (Added Pub. L. 98–369, div. A, title IV, § 451(a), July 18, 1984, 98 Stat. 819.)
